title: PML-N’s Sardar Ghulam Abbas wins PP-22 election
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 9 (APP): Pakistan Muslim League Nawaz (PML-N) candidate, Sardar Ghulam Abbas has won the election for Punjab Assembly constituency PP-22, Chakwal-cum-Talagang by securing 61,714 votes.
According to the unofficial result issued by the Returning Officer/ECP, his runner-up was Independent candidate, Nisar Ahmad, who bagged 54,077 votes.
Overall voters’ turn-out remained 58.50%.
